      int calculateFinalDiscountPrice​(Booking newBooking, boolean isGroup, boolean isPrePaid)

      boolean checkAndInsertNewBooking​(Booking newBooking)
      This method uses a critical section mechanism to check the park current availabilty, and to insert the new booking if there's enough space for it in the park for the selected time frame

      This method gets a booking and checks the priority of the waiting list for the specific park at the specific date and time range

      This method checks the availability for a specific booking, by checking the specific park parameters and active bookings on the same date and time range of the checked order.

      • parkControl

      • futureBookingsRange

        public int futureBookingsRange
        What is the future booking range, in months. Default: 4 months

      • openHour

        public int openHour
        opening hour for the parks. Default: 8AM

      • closeHour

        public int closeHour
        closing hour for the parks. Default: 18PM + Park's time limit

      • minutes

        public int minutes
        sets the minutes of the available hours. Default: 0, which means reservations can be made in jumpings of one hour

      • minimumVisitorsInReservation

        public int minimumVisitorsInReservation
        minimum visitors in reservation

      • maximumVisitorsInGroupReservation

        public int maximumVisitorsInGroupReservation

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static BookingController getInstance()
        The BookingController is defined as a Singleton class. This method allows creating an instance of the class only once during runtime of the application.
        Returns:
        the BookingController instance

      • fetchParks

        public javafx.util.Pair<javafx.collections.ObservableList<Park>,​javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String>> fetchParks()
        This method requests parks details from the database and returns a pair of observable lists of the parks, one of Park and the second of String

      • deleteBooking

        public boolean deleteBooking​(Booking deleteBooking,
                             java.lang.String table)
        This method is called for deleteing a booking from the active booking table of the specific park
        Parameters:
        deleteBooking -
        table - the table the booking need to be deleted from
        Returns:
        true if the deletion succeed, false if not

      • getParkUpdatedParameters

        private javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> getParkUpdatedParameters​(Park parkToCheck)
        This method gets a park object and returns its updated orders amount and time limit parameters from the database
        Parameters:
        parkToCheck -
        Returns:
        the updated parameters as a pair: the key is the maximum order amount, the value is the maximum time limit

      • checkAndInsertNewBooking

        public boolean checkAndInsertNewBooking​(Booking newBooking)
        This method uses a critical section mechanism to check the park current availabilty, and to insert the new booking if there's enough space for it in the park for the selected time frame
        Parameters:
        newBooking -
        Returns:
        true if the insertion succeed, false if not since the park is not available

      • checkParkAvailabilityForNewBooking

        public boolean checkParkAvailabilityForNewBooking​(Booking newBooking)
        This method checks the availability for a specific booking, by checking the specific park parameters and active bookings on the same date and time range of the checked order
        Parameters:
        booking - the booking that is checked
        Returns:
        true if there's enough place for this group, false if not

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        notify - the booking to notify its holder
        isCancel - true if a cancellation notification is needed to be sent, false if confirmation notification is needed to be sent

        public boolean updateBookingPayment​(Booking updateBooking)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the update query succeed, false if failed

      • getVisitorBookings

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Booking> getVisitorBookings​(ParkVisitor visitorCheck,
                                                                     java.lang.String tableEnding)
        This method gets a visitor and returns all his active/cancelled/done bookings in all parks
        Parameters:
        visitorCheck -
        tableEnding - determines if checking in the active/cancelled/done tables
        Returns:
        the bookings list

      • checkParkAvailabilityForExistingBooking

        public boolean checkParkAvailabilityForExistingBooking​(Booking oldBooking,
                                                       Booking newBooking)
        This method checks the availability for a specific booking, by checking the specific park parameters and active bookings on the same date and time range of the checked order. The editing booking screen allows users to modify their bookings and check availabilty after the modification. There is a need to, in some cases, substract the old booking's number of visitors from the total park capacity in order to return correct and real answer
        Parameters:
        oldBooking - the old booking that is required to be changed
        newBooking - the new booking to be checked
        Returns:
        true if there's enough place for this group, false if not

      • insertBookingToCancelledTable

        public boolean insertBookingToCancelledTable​(Booking cancelledBooking,
                                             java.lang.String reason)
        This method gets a booking and inserts the booking into the park cancelled bookings table
        Parameters:
        newBooking - the booking to insert
        Returns:
        true if the insert query succeed, false if not

      • updateBooking

        public boolean updateBooking​(Booking oldBooking,
                             Booking newBooking)
        This method gets an old booking, deletes it from the active bookings table and inserts the new booking, all within a signle transaction
        Parameters:
        oldBooking -
        newBooking -
        Returns:
        true if the update succeed, false if not

                                                                                              java.time.LocalDate fromDate,
                                                                                              java.time.LocalDate toDate)
        This method is used for showing all the slots available in a specific park for date range
        Parameters:
        parkBooked - the relevant park
        fromDate - starts from
        toDate - ends in
